table.name: billofmaterials
table.remarks: Items required to make bicycles and bicycle subassemblies. It identifies the heirarchical relationship between a parent product and its components.

column.name: productassemblyid
column.remarks: Parent product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: componentid
column.remarks: Component identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: startdate
column.remarks: Date the component started being used in the assembly item.

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: Date the component stopped being used in the assembly item.

column.name: unitmeasurecode
column.remarks: Standard code identifying the unit of measure for the quantity.

column.name: bomlevel
column.remarks: Indicates the depth the component is from its parent (AssemblyID).

column.name: perassemblyqty
column.remarks: Quantity of the component needed to create the assembly.

table.name: culture
table.remarks: Lookup table containing the languages in which some AdventureWorks data is stored.

column.name: owner
column.remarks: Employee who controls the document. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID

column.name: folderflag
column.remarks: 0 = This is a folder, 1 = This is a document.

column.name: fileextension
column.remarks: File extension indicating the document type. For example, .doc or .txt.

column.name: rowguid
column.remarks: ROWGUIDCOL number uniquely identifying the record. Required for FileStream.

column.name: diagram
column.remarks: Illustrations used in manufacturing instructions. Stored as XML.

column.name: costrate
column.remarks: Standard hourly cost of the manufacturing location.

column.name: availability
column.remarks: Work capacity (in hours) of the manufacturing location.

table.name: product
table.remarks: Products sold or used in the manfacturing of sold products.

column.name: makeflag
column.remarks: 0 = Product is purchased, 1 = Product is manufactured in-house.

column.name: finishedgoodsflag
column.remarks: 0 = Product is not a salable item. 1 = Product is salable.

column.name: reorderpoint
column.remarks: Inventory level that triggers a purchase order or work order.

column.name: sizeunitmeasurecode
column.remarks: Unit of measure for Size column.

column.name: weightunitmeasurecode
column.remarks: Unit of measure for Weight column.

column.name: daystomanufacture
column.remarks: Number of days required to manufacture the product.

column.name: productline
column.remarks: R = Road, M = Mountain, T = Touring, S = Standard

column.name: class
column.remarks: H = High, M = Medium, L = Low

column.name: style
column.remarks: W = Womens, M = Mens, U = Universal

column.name: productsubcategoryid
column.remarks: Product is a member of this product subcategory. Foreign key to ProductSubCategory.ProductSubCategoryID.

column.name: productmodelid
column.remarks: Product is a member of this product model. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

column.name: sellstartdate
column.remarks: Date the product was available for sale.

column.name: sellenddate
column.remarks: Date the product was no longer available for sale.

table.name: productcosthistory
table.remarks: Changes in the cost of a product over time.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID

table.name: productdocument
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping products to related product documents.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: documentnode
column.remarks: Document identification number. Foreign key to Document.DocumentNode.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: locationid
column.remarks: Inventory location identification number. Foreign key to Location.LocationID.

column.name: shelf
column.remarks: Storage compartment within an inventory location.

column.name: bin
column.remarks: Storage container on a shelf in an inventory location.

column.name: quantity
column.remarks: Quantity of products in the inventory location.

table.name: productlistpricehistory
table.remarks: Changes in the list price of a product over time.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID

column.name: catalogdescription
column.remarks: Detailed product catalog information in xml format.

table.name: productmodelillustration
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping product models and illustrations.

column.name: productmodelid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

column.name: illustrationid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to Illustration.IllustrationID.

table.name: productmodelproductdescriptionculture
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping product descriptions and the language the description is written in.

column.name: productmodelid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to ProductModel.ProductModelID.

column.name: productdescriptionid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to ProductDescription.ProductDescriptionID.

column.name: cultureid
column.remarks: Culture identification number. Foreign key to Culture.CultureID.

table.name: productproductphoto
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping products and product photos.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: productphotoid
column.remarks: Product photo identification number. Foreign key to ProductPhoto.ProductPhotoID.

column.name: primary
column.remarks: 0 = Photo is not the principal image. 1 = Photo is the principal image.

table.name: productreview
table.remarks: Customer reviews of products they have purchased.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: rating
column.remarks: Product rating given by the reviewer. Scale is 1 to 5 with 5 as the highest rating.

column.name: productcategoryid
column.remarks: Product category identification number. Foreign key to ProductCategory.ProductCategoryID.

table.name: transactionhistory
table.remarks: Record of each purchase order, sales order, or work order transaction year to date.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: referenceorderid
column.remarks: Purchase order, sales order, or work order identification number.

column.name: referenceorderlineid
column.remarks: Line number associated with the purchase order, sales order, or work order.

column.name: transactiondate
column.remarks: Date and time of the transaction.

column.name: transactiontype
column.remarks: W = WorkOrder, S = SalesOrder, P = PurchaseOrder

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: referenceorderid
column.remarks: Purchase order, sales order, or work order identification number.

column.name: referenceorderlineid
column.remarks: Line number associated with the purchase order, sales order, or work order.

column.name: transactiondate
column.remarks: Date and time of the transaction.

column.name: transactiontype
column.remarks: W = Work Order, S = Sales Order, P = Purchase Order

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: workorderid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to WorkOrder.WorkOrderID.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: operationsequence
column.remarks: Primary key. Indicates the manufacturing process sequence.

column.name: locationid
column.remarks: Manufacturing location where the part is processed. Foreign key to Location.LocationID.
